Choice C: Wash fruits and vegetables after cutting them

Question: The primary reason smoking is bad for health is because cigarette smoke ________?
Choice A: Inhibits the ability of haemoglobin to carry blood
Choice B: Kills the cilia in the upper respiratory tract
Choice C: Destroys normal lung cells and grows cancer
Correct Answer: Kills the cilia in the upper respiratory tract

Question: An ideal weight loss plan would:
Choice A: Feel accessible and easy to follow
Choice B: Make it easy to track my progress in detail
Choice D: Give me the freedom to enjoy foods I love while losing weight
Correct Answer: Make it easy to track my progress in detail

Question: Which statement best fits your current mindset?
Choice A: I want to lose weight but I'm clueless about where to start
Choice B: I want to measure my progress in my current weight loss journey
Choice C: I don't have the motivation to lose weight on my own
Choice D: I don't want to sacrifice my lifestyle while losing weight
Correct Answer: I don't have the motivation to lose weight on my own

Question: What's the biggest reason you might leave a weight loss program?
Choice A: I can't make it work with my daily schedule
Choice B: I forget to track my progress and lose momentum
Choice C: I feel isolated and get discouraged
Choice D: I have to make too many sacrifices in eating
Correct Answer: I can't make it work with my daily schedule

Correct Answer: Treat yourself to an amazing healthy meal

Question: What is the most overwhelming part of your weight loss journey?
Choice A: Remembering to record what I eat
Choice B: Finding an effective way to track progress
Choice D: Giving up foods that make me happy
Correct Answer: Finding an effective way to track progress

Question: I'd stick to a weight loss program if:
Choice A: Someone wrote out all the steps
Choice B: I could measure progress easily with an app
Choice C: I had a strong support system
Choice D: I didn't have to give up favorite foods
Correct Answer: Someone wrote out all the steps
